attributes.action: force John Nike to install sprinklers at all perma-snow dry ski slopes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Perma-snow has now replaced dendix at all John Nike Centres but in the dry it ruins ski and snowboard equipment.

This means that many talented sportsmen and women across the country are struggling to find places to train without destroying their own valuable equipment.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
